content:
BuildTemplateMethod Delegate

Definition

Supports ASP.NET during the creation of a template for a templated control from generated class code. The BuildTemplateMethod delegate handles the stem.Web.UI.CompiledTemplateBuilder.InstantiateIn* method.

In this Article

public delegate void BuildTemplateMethod(Control control);
Inheritance
Object
Delegate
BuildTemplateMethod

Remarks

The BuildTemplateMethod delegate is used in conjunction with the CompiledTemplateBuilder class, which creates a template for a templated control from generated class code.
